_objs:
# {title} Add Serial to GumpIgnore list, so incoming gumps with this Serial will be ignored. **NB**: Some shards have unique Serials for each gumps, some not. You have to check your shards gumps. Maybe on your shard gumps has only unique IDs, and you will use [AddGumpIgnoreByID](Api/AddGumpIgnoreByID). **NB 2**: Dont forget, that ignoring Gump is not cancel it! For server it looks like Gump received and shown by client, so server *can* wait for some gump response. So, be careful with ignore methods. ### Params: *Serial* : Gump Serial to be ignored.
### DWS\Pascal Script: ```pascal procedure AddGumpIgnoreBySerial(Serial : Cardinal); ``` ### Python: ```python def AddGumpIgnoreBySerial(Serial) ```
